a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Various measures of social expenditure as share of GDP, Japan, 1880 to
Figures correspond to various sources of information regarding public social expenditure as share of GDP. The series 'OWID
extrapolated' was constructed using the other series (see Source tab for details).
Source: Our World In Data based on OECD and Lindert (2004), OECD (1985), OECD (SOCX), LindertHistorical (2004), LindertOECDOld (2004),
